PLSqliteMigrationVersionManager Class Reference

Implements database schema versioning using SQLite's per-database user_version field (see http://www.sqlite.org/pragma.html#version). More...

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Implements database schema versioning using SQLite's per-database user_version field (see http://www.sqlite.org/pragma.html#version).

Additionally implements the requisite SQLite locking.

Warning:
This class depends on, and modifies, the SQLite per-database user_version field. Users of this class must not modify or rely upon the value of the user_version. This class will not correctly function if the user_version is externally modified.
Thread Safety
PLSqliteMigrationVersionManager instances implement no locking and must not be shared between threads.
